list.description:
#sight #bmp #bmp_2 #bmp_2m #bmp_2_m #bmp2 #bmp2m #bmp2_m
[UPDATE 29/11/2022 - removed everything useless & fixed misalignments]
"Kolya" gunsight for the BMP-2M. I just like to call it "Kolya" with no apparent reason for it

The measured distance is displayed in the "DISTANCE" window, and currently set firing distance is displayed in the "CORRECTION" window. Those 2 long lines show approximate trajectory of the ATGMs until they reach the sight center. However, it is important whether you use the barrel view or gunner optics view, as the trajectory is different depending on whi...

#sight #type61 #type_61
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions can now be illuminated & fixed distance font scale bug]
Gunsight for the type 61

For this sight, distance adjusting doesn't move the gun, but moves the 4 triangles on the horizontal line and the central arrow. As you move them up or down, the triangles and arrow align with the distance lines of the certain shell. All the shells have distance lines up to 3000 meters, and available shell trajectories are for M431 HEATFS shell, M82 APCBC shell, M313 smoke shell and coaxial MG

Illuminated gunsight is bright green instead of r...

Sight for BMD-4 , easier to lauch grenades.
Including 3OF32 and 3OF70.

BMD-4 gunner sight. Semi historical

have a nice game with VDV !

#bmd4

#sight for the #british #fv_4005 with dynamic #rangefinder

IMPORTANT
For the dynamic rangefinder to work properly you must have Mouse Wheel set to Sight Distance Control with a multiplier of 52%

DESCTIPTION
#modern style sight which shows two bracket lines which close in towards the boresight as you increase Sight Distance Control, once the tank you are aiming at fits within the closing brackets you can fire with 100% accuracy.

#sight for the #british #centurion_avre #avre with dynamic #rangefinder

IMPORTANT
For the dynamic rangefinder to work properly you must have Mouse Wheel set to Sight Distance Control with a multiplier of 52%

DESCTIPTION
#modern style sight which shows two bracket lines which close in towards the boresight as you increase Sight Distance Control, once the tank you are aiming at fits within the closing brackets you can fire with 100% accuracy.

Sights for StuG III A, StuH 42 G, StuG III F, StuG III G, (Italian) StuG III G, Panzer IV/70(V), IS-2, (Chinese) IS-2, IS-2 №402 and QF 3.7 Ram for simulator battles.

See more (including a collection of my sights and how to change the colour of the sight) here:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/979176/en/

If you would like to know how sim sights work, visit this:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/971966/en/

#sight #alltanks
This is a simple modern sight that works with all tanks in the game but i recommend using it only for top tier because that's what it's designed for


To download
just extract the zip file and drop the sight_1.blk file in Steam\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks

i hope you like it :)

Sights for Pvkv II, Strv 74,Strv m/42 DT for simulator battles.

See more (including a collection of my sights and how to change colour for the sight) here:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/979176/en/

If you would like to know how sim sights work, visit this:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/971966/en/

#kv2 #kv_2 #кв2 #кв_2 #mc #minecraft

Got rid of unnecessary lines, made the lines thinner, made range finder numbers closer, and move the range numbers next to the lines instead of half the screen away. Short range only, works for all tanks. :)


Green, Cyan, Red and Black colors available :)


twitch.tv/ImJeffafa :)

Install:
Unzip the UserSights.zip file and drag the UserSights Folder into your WT directory

#sight #sights #crosshair #simple #ImJeffafa

#sight #t72 #t72av #t72avturms #t72avturmst #t_72 #t_72a #t_72av #t_72av_turms #t_72av_turms_t #t_72_a #t_72_av
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions can now be illuminated & few cosmetic changes]
Gunsight switched with a 1964 television for the T-72AV TURMS-T. You probably already noticed that I love sights with shrinked FOV. Here it is also shrinked, but in a slightly unusual way... I thought it will look cool

Good luck using unzoomed gunner view with this sight

Distance lines automatically adapt to different shell velocities
Illuminated gunsight is bright green ins...

German universal sights in WW II & NATO / CPLA universal sights are ready.

Happy VJ Day~

bagadadi

More in:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/993921/en/

#panther #tiger #tiger_ii #m1abrams #type90 #leopard #ztz99 #ztz #ztz96 #type59

#sight #is7 #is_7 #semihistorical #semi_historical
The upper arc sets distance for the BR-482B (APCBC-HE), the lower one does so for the OF-482M (HE), both can go up to 6000 meters . Although both of those shells have truly and literally the same muzzle velocity and trajectory (so you can just use both arcs independently on the shell that is loaded)

Also, the 12,7mm KPVT MG has a standard distance lines system on the left, but for some reason it can't go over 1200 meters even if it is more in the sight code >_<

Illuminated sight is not less red than the october revolution was (sorry)

#sight #is2 #is2_44 #is21944 #is2_1944 #is_2 #is_2_1944 #is_2_44 #semihistorical #semi_historical #stadiametric
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions can be now illuminated & fixed font scale bug]
Gunsight for the IS-2 1944 with arc distance setting feat. stadiometric rangefinder optimized for 2.8 meters

(Yes I noticed that Jagdtiger on the photo doesn't truly align with the rangefinder lines, but that's because the
Jagdtiger's chassis is slightly covered from any angle you look at it in the test drive)
Also, keep in mind that the rangefinder works correctly with UNZOOMED gunner vi...

#sight #m26 #m26pershing #m26_pershing #m_26 #m_26_pershing #semihistorical #semi_historical
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions can now be illuminated & fixed distance font scale bug]
Remember this M26 gunsight I requested all the way back in March?
Now I already got enough sight coding knowledge to make it by myself

Here, keys for distance adjusting don't actually elevate or depress the gun. Instead, they move with the central X and horizontal ines. As it moves up and down, the lines aligns with the distance lines of the individual shells (and MG)

Illuminated sight is turquoise...

A pretty simple universal sight I threw together for MBTs in mind (but it works on any tank) to get a clean sight picture and make acquiring targets a bit easier. Colors can be changed in the blk file, but I chose green and red for a good contrast in normal sights and thermals. #mbt #universal


Edit: Sight is now fixed. I play on mac and apparently, whenever I use the tab key it makes a null character that messes the sight up. I have fixed it and reuploaded. Big thanks to IrresponsibleDad for helping me resolve this. Hope you enjoy!

#sight #semihistorical #semi_historical #leopard #leopard1 #leopard_1 #ww2related
[UPDATE 17/11/2021 - misalignments fixed]
Radial gunsight for the Leopard 1. Styled in german WWII sights *A Bridge Too Far Moment* because those are indeed good-looking

The small arc sets distance for HESH, currently set distance is displayed below the "DM502-HESH" text
The medium arc sets distance for HEATFS, currently set distance is displayed below the "DM12-HEATFS" text
The big arc sets distance for APDS, currently set distance is displayed below the "DM13-APDS" text
Coaxial (and top-mounted) ...

a #Stadimetric sight for the #m103. the top square is for the rangefinder estimate and the bottom one is for the detect allies one. The distance correction changes whit ammo type just like the base game. I would change this to have both this and the heat displayed nicely but it is impossible at this point because Gaijin (same issue with the t54E1).

Semi-historical universal gunsights of all countries


2025.8.8 A great update.

Optimizing all gunsights, and add JP 75+mm, SW 37mm & 75mm, USSR tkn, FR HEAT


This is a collection of all countries AFVs universal gunsights.

They are semi-historical, simple & functional.

Enjoy them !
​

#sight #semihistorical #semi_historical #amx_30 #amx30 #amx_30_super #amx30super #request #sightrequest #requested
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions in french & now can be illuminated, font scale bug fixed]
The same gunsight I did recently for the Leopard 2PL, now adjusted to fit the AMX-30 Super
Requested by @SIRLINK

#sight #m4a1 #m4a1_fl10 #m4a1_fl_10 #m4a1fl10 #m4a1fl_10
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions can now be illuminated]
Gunsight for the M4A1 Sherman FL10. Tried to make the most bizzare, yet eye-pleasing (maybe not eye-pleasing, but not awkward to look at) sight, to match how bizarre is the FL10 Sherman (atleast when it comes to looks). And I think I've kinda succeeeded, haven't I?

The inner aiming cross spins around when adjusting distance (360° spin takes approximately 3900 meters difference)
Also, see those two groups of 6 circles upwards? They represent the FL10's autoloader, and ...

#sight #semihistorical #semi_historical #leopard #leopard2pl #leopard_2pl #leopard_2_pl
[UPDATE 28/05/2022 - fixed misalignments]
The most successful gunsight of mine so far, finally fixed. All there was to fix was the arrow pointing at distance lines and the distance correction in bottom-left corner

Distance fire system : Linear
Supported ammunition : Any
Rangerfinder : in-game
FOV Shrinked : no
Gunsight illumination : Bright green

#help the coax for the #amx30 series seem to be broke for the premiums with the 12.7mm and the 20mm is not listed in the wiki.
If anybody knows what the fix for this is that would be great, thanks.

#sight #is3 #is_3
Gunsight for the IS-3. Tried to combine the style of Soviet WWII and postwar gunsights, and a fine crosshair because...it looks cool on tanks

The gunsight is variable, automatically adapts to velocity of the shell that is chosen to be loaded
